title: [GAMEPLAY] Drowsy from Zoe E doesn't increase damage from Liandry's Torment
body:
Drowsy slows enemy champions, so intuitively, it should cause {{item:3151}} to deal increased damage. However, it does not (refer to the clip). As you can see on the training dummies, each tick during drowsy deals 42-43 damage, and it is only once they fall asleep that it deals 71-72 damage. This appears to happen consistency, and independently of madness stacks.

Here is an additional clip on a bot, to show that it's not solely a training dummy issue: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/449313836642729984/624676757626290179/9-18_NA1-3153722160_01.webm .

Reproduction:
1) Buy Liandry's Torment on Zoe.
2) Hit an enemy champion with her E.

replies.body: well there an obvious reason this bug hasnt been fixed.  Nobody is building liandry's on zoe
well they should be, item is busted
